Steps.StepString: Started the CTF Challenge in Houseplant CTF 2020 – Fire/place which fell under the web category and was worth 1783 points

Substeps.SubstepString: Started the CTF Challenge in Houseplant CTF 2020 – Fire/place.
Checked the category and points of the challenge. It was a web category and was worth 1783 points.

Steps.StepString: Given the instruction that there is something inside the HTML page

Substeps.SubstepString: Received instructions about the presence of certain elements inside the HTML page.

Steps.StepString: Given fire-place[0].html e4a4c2321d18246d027184605ca52866 as the challenge

Substeps.SubstepString: Received fire-place[0].html e4a4c2321d18246d027184605ca52866 as the challenge.
Downloaded the provided HTML file.

Steps.StepString: The HTML file connected to a Firestore environment

Substeps.SubstepString: Observed that the HTML file establishes a connection to a Firestore environment.

Steps.StepString: The Firestore environment contained a canvas in which users could color pixels which get stored into Firestore repository

Substeps.SubstepString: Explored the Firestore environment and found a canvas for users.
Observed that colored pixels on the canvas get stored into Firestore repository.

Steps.StepString: Opened the browser console to interact with Firebase installation

Substeps.SubstepString: Opened the browser console.
Started interacting with the Firebase installation using the browser console.

Steps.StepString: Analyzed the client source code and read the official Firebase Firestore documentation

Substeps.SubstepString: Analyzed the client source code.
Read the official Firebase Firestore documentation.

Steps.StepString: Used the provided code snippet to retrieve data from each document in Firestore

Substeps.SubstepString: Used the provided code snippet.
Retrieved data from each document in the Firestore database using the code snippet.

Steps.StepString: The retrieved data was found to be structures containing all the RGB values for pixels

Substeps.SubstepString: Verified the contents of the retrieved data.
Found that the data are structures that contain all the RGB values for pixels.
Tried accessing a document called 'flag' in the Firestore database.

Steps.StepString: The retrieved data from the 'flag' document contained the lyrics of a song and the required flag

Substeps.SubstepString: Verified the contents of the 'flag' document.
Found that the document contained the lyrics of a song and the required flag.
Located the flag within the 'flag' document data.
Identified the flag to be 'rtcp{d0n't_g1ve_us3rs_db_a((3ss}'.
